name: Take Aim
desc: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

name: Headshot
desc: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly stop the movements of his enemies.

name: Holy Persuasion
desc: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Can be cast on allies to teleport them back to base. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him.   Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Leech Seed
desc: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.  Pulses 7 times.

name: Voodoo Restoration
desc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.

name: Berserker's Blood
desc: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic damage resistance based on missing health.

name: Rage
desc: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant to magic damage, and gaining increased attack speed. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Searing Chains
desc: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.

name: Static Link
desc: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor.

name: Hand of God
desc: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.
